import React from 'react' import "./Singup.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Validation from './LoginValidation' function Signup() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ name: '', last_name: '', email: '', password: '' }) const [errors, setErrors]= useState({}) const handleInput = (event) => { setValues(prev => ({...prev, [event.target.name] : [event.target.value]})) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setErrors(Validation(values)); } return (
